title: What’s the Most Valuable Tech Upgrade You Made This Year?
description: We asked 10 founders and CEOs about the tech products and AI automations that really made a difference.
author: Sunshine Flint
excerpt: We asked 10 founders and CEOs about the tech products and AI automations that really made a difference.

Our Bevi water machine, infrared sauna, Sonos setup, and Zoom rooms help ensure that in-office collaboration time is fun and worthwhile, while remote work vibes rely on G Suite and Slack.” Martha Shaughnessy,Founder, The Key PR “Financial Flywheel, an advanced reporting platform that enhances our team’s ability to deliver deeper insights, driving smarter decisions to fuel our clients’ growth and strategic goals.” “An AI-powered essay grader that gives immediate feedback and recommendations, providing students within one minute something that previously took human graders three business days to deliver.” Andrew S. RosenCEO and chairman, Kaplan “Four AI tools to monitor and manage incoming leads and client requests, freeing up valuable time to provide personalized attention to clients.” “We relaunched our website on WordPress, where we repositioned our fractional executive assistant agency given our deep experience in the crowded virtual assistant market.” Stephanie BullCo-founder, ProAssisting “The Michigan Career Portal is the state’s first AI-driven platform to help with career navigation, job training, education, guidance, and placement.” “GTIN.cloud, a UPC/GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) validation tool that gives brand owners full control of their product data.” Andrew VerbPresident, Bar Code Graphics  “Whale, a knowledge repository software that enables us to quickly onboard, train, and gain continuity among our team as we scale rapidly.” Explore More Power Partner Awards CompaniesTop TechWeekly roundup of the latest in tech news
html:
We asked 10 founders and CEOs about the tech products and AI automations that really made a difference.

Inc. Art / photos: Getty Images

Nam consequat ante non varius pulvinar. Nunc consequat quam a pharetra dignissim. Fusce auctor sed sapien condimentum semper.

“We built a custom project-budgeting and forecasting tool that integrates with our QuickBooks accounting system and provides our teams with real-time cost data and revenue projections on their construction projects.”

“Docusign IAM, an AI-powered platform that helps businesses navigate the critical information hidden in their agreements for smarter decisions, faster workflows, and greater efficiency.”

“Tools that enable hybrid work. Our Bevi water machine, infrared sauna, Sonos setup, and Zoom rooms help ensure that in-office collaboration time is fun and worthwhile, while remote work vibes rely on G Suite and Slack.”

Martha Shaughnessy,
Founder, The Key PR

“Financial Flywheel, an advanced reporting platform that enhances our team’s ability to deliver deeper insights, driving smarter decisions to fuel our clients’ growth and strategic goals.”

“An AI-powered essay grader that gives immediate feedback and recommendations, providing students within one minute something that previously took human graders three business days to deliver.”

Andrew S. Rosen
CEO and chairman, Kaplan

“Four AI tools to monitor and manage incoming leads and client requests, freeing up valuable time to provide personalized attention to clients.”

“We relaunched our website on WordPress, where we repositioned our fractional executive assistant agency given our deep experience in the crowded virtual assistant market.”

Stephanie Bull
Co-founder, ProAssisting

“The Michigan Career Portal is the state’s first AI-driven platform to help with career navigation, job training, education, guidance, and placement.”

“GTIN.cloud, a UPC/GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) validation tool that gives brand owners full control of their product data.”

Andrew Verb
President, Bar Code Graphics 

“Whale, a knowledge repository software that enables us to quickly onboard, train, and gain continuity among our team as we scale rapidly.”
